moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Buff Iroh
characters.description: tea lover, inspirational, sweet uncle dude

moves.name: Jasmine Dragon
moves.description: Iroh brews a pot of hot tea that he uses to burn his opponent

moves.name: White Lotus
moves.description: Iroh attacks with his white lotus wisdom

moves.name: Ba Sing Se
moves.description: Iroh fuels his firey attacks with the rage and sorrow of the events at Ba Sing Se

moves.name: Bath Song
moves.description: Iroh takes a quick bath and sings a song out of tune, hurting his opponent's ears

new moves.name: Jasmine Dragon
new moves.description: Aang harnesses his inner dragon, unleashing a breath of fire
